en.title: FE Donates QPs to Perwira K9 Wheelchair Basketball Dream Team
en.content:
FE is proud to donate QPs to Perwira K9 Malaysia’s Wheelchair Basketball Dream Team to help them perform better in competitions. Perwira K9 is a multi racial and a non governmental organization that depends solely on the public for support. The committee is managed by the disabled who are all wheelchair bound. 

The Chairman of Perwira K9 Malaysia is Ras Adiba Radzi. The Founder & Advisor is Chong Tuck Meng PJK. YB Dato Seri Mohd Radzi bin Sheikh Ahmad (former Minister of Home Affairs) is also an Advisor to Perwira K9 Malaysia.
